courses-header-title: Become a top proffesional that you were meant to be
courses-header-description: Vision: To transform Armenia into a high-tech hub with a powerful youth that has technological capabilities, creativity, and an innovative mindset, producing life-changing solutions and impactful ideas.
standart-courses-description: GITC's offline courses are held in computer labs located in both Gyumri and Yerevan. These labs have been designed to provide an innovative and engaging learning environment, with state-of-the-art equipment and technology. The modern and well-equipped labs provide students with the tools and resources they need to get hands-on experience with the latest technologies.
online-courses-description: GITC's online courses offer a convenient and accessible way to learn programming and tech skills. Taught by experienced professionals, they provide a comprehensive curriculum, interactive lessons, and hands-on exercises for students to develop the skills needed for success in the IT industry. Sign up today and start learning!
